title: Banned for adc feeding and refusing to farm

replies.body: You are punished for your actions, not the actions of anyone else. If you feel you were unjustly punished, please post your chat logs.
I always laugh when they say, I GOT BANNED CUZ MY ADC WAS A BANANA WITH HANDS.
{{champion:16}} {{item:3031}} I'm viable... {{item:3070}}

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Tantram,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=AuxfiJIT,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2016-03-08T00:23:01.045+0000)
>
> You are punished for your actions, not the actions of anyone else. If you feel you were unjustly punished, please post your chat logs.

Typical riot, wants players to fix the problems that they ultimately can solve, but won't.

If only RIOT was punished for their actions.  We even give you your chat logs. :T

Riot is literally the same disfigured image as their community.

"Senior Spaghetti Engineer", oh you literally are up there on the 'can fix, but won't because LoL' list, send regards to whoever managed to disable dragon whenever gp ulted, or disable zed's autoattack and ult to have him hit everything when it spawns instead. :T

chat logs chat logs Chat Logs Chat Logs CHAT LOGS CHAT LOGS 
Everybody, chant it with me!

CHAT
LOGZ
CHAT
LOGZ
CHAT
LOGZ
No chat logs, no sympathy.
Let's see the chat log. Because I suspect your choice of words in responding played a factor in this.

What were you actually banned for? Chat toxicity? If so please post your chat logs.

You were not banned because someone else was feeding.
classic league community.

> [{quoted}](name=TSM NoobSlayer,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=AuxfiJIT,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-03-08T00:10:08.935+0000)
>
> classic league community.

Yes, this is exactly why you should uninstall. The community is bad, in your opinion, so why stick around? 

When someone offers help on a forum, but needs something like  a chat log and you _fail_  to provide one, nobody is going to take you seriously because we think you don't want to post it due to the fact that it would potentially self-incriminate. amirite?
Classic flamer refusing to share chat logs.
http://www.auplod.com/u/dplauo75eb3.gif
https://lh6.googleusercontent.com/-IDi0pJD1DLw/VHJ_zaceN9I/AAAAAAAAEZ4/UDNwlW1qjBc/s300/Banhammer.gif

Telling only half the story doesn't get you anywhere. You might as well tell us the whole story and then people can tell you if you were rightly banned. Post your reform card and all the other crap and see where the chips fall. Too many people have already tried the "i got banned because someone else was trolling and i am innocent and fart rainbows of joy and happiness" routine.
Can't even spare you the benefit of the doubt man, if you are not going to provide more info.
How was your reaction on that?

jinx said tht i was shit first then said it was her first time on jinx after feeding.  she continued to feed all game
i didnt care the game was over, she said sorry or something at the end, then i get banned for nothing

Doesn't matter who started or finished it. When a player is reported, the system looks only at their behavior and theirs alone.

So again, if you would please post the chat log or link to the chat log that Riot sent to you as part of your reform card/email. One of us can then provide direct answers to why you were banned.
everyone said they were reporting ppl how did i get banned

You know what i never see on these boards?? A person saying I got banned for being a glue sniffing, window licking, unapologetic, intentional feeder. Riot will ban even the most most harmless of comments now. Don't use chat and do ur best to avoid talking to clearly stupid people. Avoid 75 percent of this community and you might enjoy your games and climb ranks.
I feel your pain, RIOT is really screwing the pooch when it comes to banning for "toxic" comments. #PeopleLeavingLeagueForCancerAmins
